EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Follow Up Email - No Show Toronto
EmailTemplate.subject: We're sorry we missed you at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop - Toronto
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We’re sorry you were unable to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Toronto on December 4.
Visit run.pivotal.io <http://run.pivotal.io> to try Pivotal Web Services - simply upload your files and your app just works! Additionally, we’ve made the workshop presentations available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/tagged/pivotal%20cloud%20platform%20roadshow> so you can catch up on what you missed.
Interested in learning more about what Pivotal CF can do for your organization? Contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team.
We look forward to seeing you at our next event!
The Pivotal Team
